description: Two-candle bullish reversal pattern where a large green candle completely engulfs the previous red candle's body. Signals shift from selling to buying pressure.
validationRules: Second candle body completely covers first candle body
Second candle opens below first candle close
Second candle closes above first candle open
Pattern forms after downtrend or at support
invalidationSignals: Second candle fails to fully engulf first candle
Pattern forms in middle of uptrend (not reversal)
commonMistakes: Entering without waiting for confirmation candle
Not checking if wicks are engulfed (bodies are what matter)
Trading every engulfing pattern - context is key
Not placing stop below engulfing candle low

tradeSetup.entry: Above engulfing candle high or on pullback
tradeSetup.target: Nearest resistance or risk-reward based target

supportive: High volume on engulfing candle (2x+ average)
